Text:
bro i 4 1 appretiate ur work 
would u help me with how u create these masterpieces i want 2 do the same but 4 a long time now i have failed using TTS it never turned out gr8  would u care to help me on how exactly to go about creating these audio files from text

Sure - no problem!

Contact me at DragonKP@email.ru and we start from there !!!

I can understand why you would use computer voice tech for books that are not available as read by humans, but why go to the trouble for books (like THE PRINCE) that are already both available as torrents ANS narrated by real people?

@ rambam1776: if you could find another version of this book with a human voice, please, post the link. 
I checked the Pirate Bay and its only this version.
